Waipara Wines

We have three organic hillside vineyards on clay limestone soils in North Canterbury.

Our wines

We're set on making our wines true to the place they grow. The winemaking is simple good estate grown fruit, organic & biodynamic, handpicked, vineyard derived yeasts, no additives or fining, minimal sulphur at bottling and where possible, no filtration. Then we have character.

Our cuisine

Our cellar door and restaurant is open Wednesday to Sunday 10am to 5pm
+64 3 314 6085

map
We have two hats with Cuisine Good Food Awards. See what they have to offer in our Lunch & Drinks menu
Book a Table

Accommodation at our bed & breakfast

Stay at our beautiful bed & breakfast studio. Located on the ground floor of an architecturally designed building which also houses a lunch time restaurant (Cuisine Winery Restaurant of the Year 2017) at the opposite end. The views are vast, expanding from vineyards to the majestic Southern Alps. Complimentary light breakfast provisions are supplied. Takeaway meals can be before ordered before 4pm. The restaurant closes at 5pm so you'll have the place & sunset to yourselves.

Book Now

Accommodation at Kumiko’s guest house

Experience the timeless beauty of Japanese design in harmony with the pristine New Zealand landscape at Kumiko’s Guesthouse – your perfect haven amongst the vineyards of Waipara. This guesthouse was built in 1995 by Waipara wine pioneer Russell Black for his wife Kumiko. It comprises many of the elements found in the gracious architecture of traditional Japan and extensive architectural gardens that reflect the dramatic views of the shifting North Canterbury skies.

Book Now
